pkgmetadata.longdescription: # treeviewtreeview is a simple folder structure viewer.## InstallationUse the package manager [pip](https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/) to install treeview.```bashpip install treeview```## Usage```bashtreeview [TYPE t g] [PATH TO JSON] [NAME OF TREE] [OUTPUT FOLDER]```where: t for text-based output g for graph-based output## License[MIT](https://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit/)
